Business news

Fraud
Sber warned about a new scheme of legal fraud.
Sbera's specialists have identified a new pattern of fraud against legal persons.
15:01, 23 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Goods
In Finland, the terminal in Coupula became unused without a cargo flow from Russia
The logistic terminal in the Finnish city of Coupula, built in 2023 for Euro36 million, was unused six months later.
14:05, 23 January 2024♪
dp.ru
FACH
Petersburg sailed after warmth.
According to the communal services, more than 120 cm of snow have fallen since the beginning of the winter season in Petersburg. Nature was particularly generous at the meteli in the last seven days, when the snow dunes were lit in an hour, even after the washing machine. Last year ' s precipitation rates are already at least 1.5 times.
13:42, 23 January 2024♪
Egor Kulakov
Payroll
Names of occupations with the highest and lowest wages in Petersburg
The development team leaders led the ranking of the most paid professions in Petersburg last January.
12:38, 23 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Turkey
The problems of remittances from Russia to Turkey have been solved for a number of industries
Turkish entrepreneurs began to receive payments from Russian buyers. The newspaper Ekonomim refers to this by reference to Turkish companies.
12:10, 23 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Consumer credit
Almost 7 per cent of bank loans were issued in December on car bonds
At the end of 2023, Russian banks increased the issuance of consumer loans on car collateral. Data from the National Credit Stories Bureau (NBKI) indicate this.
11:28, 23 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Development
GloraX invests 1.4 billion roubles in its own project bureau
GloraX will establish an internal project bureau and become a full-cycle federal developer. Investment in the new unit will be about 1.44 billion roubles. The company press service reported on Tuesday, 23 January.
11:10, 23 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Exchange
Kabmin supported the extension of foreign exchange earnings by exporters until the end of the year
Russian GovernmentDecided to extend the mandatory sale of foreign exchange earnings by the largest Russian exporters until the end of 2024.
10:49, 23 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Work
The authorities suggested that discrimination in recruitment should be prohibited due to military service.
The Russian leadership intends to prohibit employers from denying a candidate for employment because of his military service or disability. Amendments to the Labour Code were proposed by the Office of the State and Law of the President, as set out in the table of amendments prepared for consideration by the working group of the Committee on Labour of the State.
10:29, 23 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Real property lease
The areas of Petersburg were identified, where the most expensive housing rent was
According to the Real Estate Agency Restate, the average rental rates in Petersburg have increased by more than 40 per cent over the past year, from 34,000 to 48,000 roubles per month.
10:24, 23 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Georgi Poltavachen
Georgi Poltavchenko headed the Ranggis Trust Board in Petersburg
Georgi Poltavchenko was headed by the Guardian Council of the Russian Academy of the People ' s Economy and Public Service of the President of the Russian Federation (RANHIGS) in Petersburg, informed the university and confirmed the Delovo Petersburg surrounded by the former Governor.
09:53, 23 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Yandex
The owner of the main Yandex law enforcement in Russia was the Russian ICAO
The owner of the main Yandex lawn in Russia was a newly-educated Russian MCAO instead of Yandex N.V.
09:40, 23 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Right
Loan at the stud: notaries told me how not to get into a debt pit.
Currency contracts are generally notarized. And you have to understand that this is an equal guarantee of legality not only for the borrower, but also for the borrower. It is in the notary office that can tell how to pay or borrow; and how to do so should not be done.
08:37, 23 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Euros
In the European Union, a time limit was set for an agreement on income from Russian assets.
The European Union will decide to use revenues from Russian assets in the near future. The head of European diplomacy, Joseph Borrel, reported this.
08:00, 23 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Foreign business
Business fees for January exceeded the annual forecast six times.
Business fees for January exceeded the annual plan six times. This is the case with the funds that leave companies in Russia ' s budget.
06:58, 23 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Belarus
The owners of the Eurobonds of Belarus sent Minsk a notification of defolt.
A group of Belarusian State Holders sent a defolt notification to Minsk. This is reported by the BCRC with reference to the notification.
06:27, 23 January 2024♪
dp.ru
Telecom and IT
The market for telecom services in Russia will for the first time exceed 2 trillion roubles
In recent years, the telecom market has grown steadily by 2 to 3 per cent per year. After 2022, it was 1.9 trillion roubles. The analysts expect it to exceed 2 trillion for the first time in the 2023s. According to the Director-General of Telecom, Daily Denis Cuscova, the main drivers of growth are now the mobile internet, which is part of the documentary electricity, mobile communications (single), as well as accession and traffic passes.
06:04, 23 January 2024♪
Karash Nogaeva
Marketing
Online contract: Russia ' s advertising market increased by 23 per cent per year
The share of investments in the digital relay in the Russian market increased from 57 per cent to 58 per cent per year. The CPx category, contextual announcements, has become the leader of investments among online platforms. In 2022, the segment held 26 per cent of all budgets, in 2023 it increased to 30 per cent.
06:04, 23 January 2024♪
Alina Kisyakova
Tobacco
Belarusian presents: the budget loses billions of roubles from illegal tobacco.
The National Research Centre for Competences in Combating Illicit Trafficking in Industrial Products (NCC) presented at a round table organized by the AP, the results of a nationwide study on illicit trafficking in tobacco products.
06:03, 23 January 2024♪
Dimitri Marakulin
Beer Industry
Pawned: the ban on imported beer would escalate gray supply.
The Deputies of the State have asked Prime Minister Michael Misustin to include imported beer in the list of agricultural products, raw materials and food prohibited from importing from non-traditional countries. As previously reported by the ADP, in the nine months of 2023, exports of beer from EU countries rose almost 1.5 times (from 133.1 million to 195.3 million euros) in value terms of a similar period in 2022, from 305,000 to 229,000 tons by volume.
06:03, 23 January 2024♪
Darya Dimitrieva
Contact.
